nugget.text: LeBron plays 82 games for 1st time in career
Heat grab 6th in East behind Ellington (32 pts)

broadcasters.shortName: 790 The Ticket / S: WRTO MIX 98.3 FM

nugget.text: Late Magic rally drops Wizards to 8th in East
Sixers earn 3rd in East with 16th straight win
Moreland: 16 pts, 17 reb, 4 ast, 4 stl, 4 blk
Wolves secure first playoff berth since 2004
Hart: 30 pts; Payton II: 25 pts, 12 reb
Lillard (36p/ 10a) leads Blazers to 3rd in West
Rockets finish with best record by seven games
